version_description: Bugs Fixes and Payroll Module

Updates in v3.5.0:
- Polling
- Add bank transfer type jenius
- Add bank transfer type Mandiri Cash Management
- Activity Recording
- Upload Attachment Bussiness Trip Request & Declaration

And for SunFish HR Customers:
- Claim balance
- Download Attachments of Policies and Announcements

This is our biggest update yet and we are very Proud of it
SunFish Go is becoming GreatDay HR
Updates in v4.4.0:
Bugs Fixes and Performance
Updates in v4.0.0:
- Post your daily Achievements, show you were having a Great Day at work
- You can now Upload Attendance from a 3rd Party Attendance Machine
- We changed the Home Screen to get you to the stuff you use the most
- You can upload your Leave usage
- New Web interface for Employee Org Chart

New features in v5.0.0:
- You can chat (personal or group message) with your office colleagues (ask us to turn this feature up for on premise customers)
- New and updated employee benefits (now with insurances and more loan providers)
- Updated Payroll system
- Added support for overnight attendance
- Updated tasks and feedback
- Bugs Fixes and Performance
- And more

New features in v5.4.0:
- QR Code Attendance
- Download Organization Chart as PDF or PNG
- Upload Career History
- Upload at Announcements and Policies
- Half Day Leave Requests
- Bugs Fixes and Performance Improvements
Bugs fixes and performance improvements

New features in v5.6.0:
- New ID Card Generation Feature
- Improved UI/UX on Login Screen
- New Demo Accounts
- Bugs Fixes and Performance Improvements

5.7.0 Fixes issues on some users not able to access server

New features in v5.6.0:
- New ID Card Generation Feature
- Improved UI/UX on Login Screen
- New Demo Accounts
- Bugs Fixes and Performance Improvements

Thanks for your feedback!
We know very well you need a quicker way to do your work. So, we’re always trying to improve and make it happen!
Update to 6.3.0 and get these improvements!

- Bye bugs! We've squashed them.
- Easy password reset
No more taking long steps to reset password to get your account back, you get a simple way to do it!
- User rating improvement
A Friday surprise for you who come on time every day

A new fresh look of GreatDay HR home feed is coming to greet you!

Here are the notable design changes of new home feed you can enjoy:
- The main features of GreatDay HR provided in the homepage.
- ‘Today’s Teammate’ feature that allows you to monitor your team’s attendance and task.

Update to 7.0.0 and get these out!

7.2.0 has multiple bugs fixes and performance improvements

A new fresh look of GreatDay HR home feed is coming to greet you!

Here are the notable design changes of new home feed you can enjoy:
- The main features of GreatDay HR provided in the homepage.
- ‘Today’s Teammate’ feature that allows you to monitor your team’s attendance and task.

Update to 7 and get these out!

7.4.1 has multiple bugs fixes and performance improvements

I know you are generous enough to transfer money on your payday, or perhaps it's for debt payment?
Now you can transfer using Payroll Transfer on GreatDay. It automatically transfer your money to other accounts registered on GreatDay.

Great, isn't it?
Ask us for more details.

You can use this feature on ver. 7.6.0.

7.12.0 has bugs fixes and performance improvements
7.11.0
We now have a new Event feature and we also support to record your Break Times
Contact us for more information

7.13.0 has a new recruitment and onboarding module. Ask us for early access
As always, we have bug fixes and performance improvements

7.14.0 Fixes a Bug when recording Attendance and has the Timesheet Module. (Ask us about Timesheet)
7.13.0 has a new recruitment and onboarding module. Ask us for early access
As always, we have bug fixes and performance improvements
Bug fixes and performance improvements
Bug fixes and performance improvements

Welcome to 7.21.0

This one has many new features for our GreatDay Basic Users
First, we are introducing a new Onboarding for Admins of our GreatDay Basic Product. The Goal here is to help setup your company by yourself.

Also, Break Times can be used now. Ask our Support to help you get it setup.

And also for our Indonesian Users, the Subscription Manager has more Payment Options, so give it a try.

For SunFish/GreatDay Pro Users
There now more Details in the Profile that can be updated.

And for SunFish ERP Users, we have added more Types of Approvals.

Like usual we also have some Bug Fixes and Performance Improvements.
Especially that Bug regarding the time changing itself at the Attendance Correction Feature.


Also, Version 8 is coming soon. We'll let you know when its ready.

As always some Bugs and performance updates, including:
* Adding balance for certain types of claims (Greatday HR)
* Added "Shift Daily" filter (Greatday HR Pro)
* Added a Special Day option in "Holiday Type" (Greatday HR)
* Fixed loading issue after scanning "Patrol" (Greatday HR and Greatday HR Pro)
* Added "reload list" after adding Claim Type (Greatday HR)
* Fixed "e.substring is not a function" in the "Attendance Base Photo" feature (Greatday HR and Greatday HR Pro)

What's New:
1. Automatic Overtime in the Shift Daily menu. (GDHR)
2. Calendar feature in the Leave menu. (GD HR and GD Pro)

Bug Fixes:
1. Date color of shifts that are set as holidays. (Shift Schedule - GDHR)
2. Difference between the number of records from Download Excel and Preview Report features. (Report attendance summary - GDHR).
3. Incorrect time after the synchronization process. (Activity Recording Offline - GDHR & GD Pro)
4. Unsent photos after the synchronization process. (Activity Recording Offline - GDHR &GDPro)
5. Employee names that appeared more than once on the Invite Member menu. (Invite Member - GDHR)
6. Company name that didn't change after using the move company feature. (GD Pro)
